Message: The user completes the submission of the form
my ad is pending for a while now

I understand that your ad is pending. Could you please provide me with some additional details? Specifically, I need to know the campaign start date, the bidding type you are using, your targeting or budget settings, and if there have been any recent changes in the last 72 hours. This information will help me assist you better.
4/13 to 4/20 bid type cpm $4 per thousand impressions,$80 budget ...no changes in past 72 hours its been in review for almost 5 days

Thank you for providing the details. Since your ad has been pending for almost 5 days, it might be due to account verification issues. To proceed with the verification process and have your account approved, please provide the following details by emailing adsupport@newsbreak.com with the subject line: Business Verification –
- Company's full address
- Company's legal entity name
- Company's EHID or DUNS number
- Primary contact person's name
- Company's phone number
Once we receive this information, we will conduct a thorough review and update you on your account status. We appreciate your cooperation in maintaining a secure and compliant advertising environment for all our partners.
